scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n react,vue,svelte -c blue,green,magenta "pnpm dev:react" "pnpm dev:vue" "pnpm dev:svelte"
scripts.docs:build: pnpm build && vitepress build docs && pnpm docs:build:demos
scripts.docs:build:demos: pnpm docs:build:demo:react && pnpm docs:build:demo:vue && pnpm docs:build:demo:svelte && pnpm docs:copy:demos
scripts.docs:build:demo:react: cd apps/demo/react && pnpm exec vite build --base=/vizel/demo/react/
scripts.docs:build:demo:vue: cd apps/demo/vue && pnpm exec vite build --base=/vizel/demo/vue/
scripts.docs:build:demo:svelte: cd apps/demo/svelte && pnpm exec vite build --base=/vizel/demo/svelte/
scripts.docs:copy:demos: mkdir -p docs/.vitepress/dist/demo && cp -r apps/demo/react/dist docs/.vitepress/dist/demo/react && cp -r apps/demo/vue/dist docs/.vitepress/dist/demo/vue && cp -r apps/demo/svelte/dist docs/.vitepress/dist/demo/svelte
scripts.test:ct: concurrently -g -n react,vue,svelte -c blue,green,magenta "pnpm test:ct:react" "pnpm test:ct:vue" "pnpm test:ct:svelte"
scripts.test:ct:seq: pnpm test:ct:react && pnpm test:ct:vue && pnpm test:ct:svelte
